alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hillsborough County through 500 PM EDT... At 426 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverview, or near Brandon, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brandon, Fish Hawk, Riverview, Palm River-Clair Mel, Boyette, Valrico, Progress Village, Mango, Lithia Springs State Park, Bloomingdale, Seffner and Gibsonton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
